Summary: 4 white spheres moving south and upward towards the moon, engaged with 6-8 smaller black objects moving in same direction.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Canton
There were no other sightings in Canton on or around June 20th 2010
divs: sighting detailsaround 8:40, i was packing up the car, in the driveway, in canton mi, i looked up towards the moon to the south and saw 4 white spheres making a shape similar to the "dipper" part of the big dipper.. in fact, thats what i instictivly thought it was, but it wasnt dark yet, there were no clouds in that part of the sky, no other stars could be seen in any direction, the sky was blue and clear and the moon 3\4 full and crystal clear.. as i stared i tried to figure out what these "stars" were, i realized they were in motion! and moving fast to the east and up towards the direction of the moon. i was stunned. these things were twice the size of what venus looks like in the night sky, but they werent glowing, there was no contrail like a jet, and they werent staying in the 'dipper" formation.. so i looked to the far west and saw a jet high in the sky leaving a signature contrail, i looked to the far east and could see a low flying jet comming into detroit metro.. so it was obvious to me these were not planes, and the objects were far away.. the freakiest thing of all was what was happening around the 2 "lower" objects.. there were 3-4 black objects, about 2% of the size of the white objects, engaged with the white ones!! it looked as if the black ones were in some sort of "dog-fight" type of movement.. at times the black ones would be forming a straight-line formation and then break apart and swarm the white, moving back and forth across its path...fast.. diving and circling around the white ones, aggressively.. it was sureal.., i yelled to my family standing by the doorway to come watch, and even they were like, *(acronym deleted--sgonzalez\cms) is that!! this all happened for about 45sec-1min, and then all the objects faded up and out toward the direction of the moon.. i really had the feeling that i was watching something that wasn't "natural" in a biological sense.. the motion of these objects seemed very mechanical and fast! really fast! especially the black objects.. and like i said, these objects were not moving down towards the earth, they were moving away and up towards the moon!
